author: jfarcand
msg: Always associate a Subject. If not created, then create a default one.

author: remm
msg: - Remove the artificial limit of 3 for classpath creation. It seems like a bad idea
to do this (if the parent CLs are not correctly setup, Tomcat won't work anyway).

author: fhanik
msg: 1. added in support for sending out access time pings
2. added in support for session.invalidate to go out to the other nodes in the cluster

author: kinman
msg: - Add an compilation option to generate writing char arrays instead of Strings

author: remm
msg: - Refactor manager initialization, and move it into ContextConfig.
